short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: STConnect is a WebRTC client for PBX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SureTel Beta Hosted VOIP Web App
Google Chrome Extension for SureTel Beta PBX.

This is white-lable extension of Hoduphone and beta version of suretel.

SureTel Beta works using WebRTC & SIP protocol. It makes communication easy and cost-effective.

Key features of SureTel Beta are:

-> Audio/Video Calls
-> Call Transfer
-> Conferencing
-> Call Hold/Park
-> Mute/ Unmute
-> Extension Settings
-> Call History Log
-> Contact
-> Play & Download your voicemail
-> Instant Messaging (Chat/SMS)
